'''Potential Energy Orbs''' are an exploration mechanic in [[Fontaine]].

The player can shoot these orbs by using the ability of the [[Xenochromatic Ball Octopus]] to aim. The longer the player holds the ability, the more power the orb will be shot with. The goal is to shoot the orb into rings to complete challenges.
